text: neohuineun geudeul-eul salanghaneu nyo geuleona neohuiga geudeul-ui modeun seong seoleul midneundedo geudeul-eun neohuileul sa langhaji anhdoda geudeul-i neohuileul man nalttaemyeon ulineun midneundago malhana heullo iss-eul ttae geudeul-eun neohuiege geu deul-ui songalag-eul kkaemulmyeo bunnohani illeo galodoe neohuiui noyeoum-eulo myeolmanghal geos-ila sillo hananim-eun ma eum-ui bimildeul-eul da algo gyesinila
